reviews.text: My wife and our little daughter and I stayed at the Best Western Ikibin for about 3 weeks.
reviews.title: Very good location. Good Hotel

reviews.text: 10-15 minute walk to the Tunus and Tunali Streets with all the main stores and restaurants.
reviews.title: Hard to Recommend

reviews.text: Clean room, not too small with comfortable bathrooms. One big minus is the fungi in the bathroom and that is a pity -the jacuzzi remained unused because of that.
reviews.title: Just fine

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were very friendly. Internet was a bit interrupted at the first few days, but then worked well. Good breakfast.
reviews.title: Average place to stay, better if you're in Ankara for business

reviews.text: This hotel is in dire need of an make over. A fesh coat of paint in the rooms, new linens and upgrade the furniture.
reviews.title: Hotel make over?

reviews.text: I stay at Best Western whenever possible unfortunately, this hotel needs a total rehab. Cigarette burned furniture and threadbare sheets, plus finding a used tube of lipstick under the desk was a real turn off.
reviews.title: Good choice

reviews.text: I stayed here only one night. It is reasonably priced and worth it.
reviews.title: Not sure it's good enough

reviews.text: Nice breakfast buffet. Small and nice hotel. Very convenient location for business.
reviews.title: Enjoyed my stay in this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very easy and small rooms. Old style TV. Very bad WiFi on 4 floor, very hard to work with it, because it was alwase breaking.
reviews.title: Location

reviews.text: Mould in bathrooms; in the bedroom ceilings, in the fan grills is UNACCEPTABLE!
reviews.title: the WORST hotel/mote/hostel i have encountered in life

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel deserves anything but 4-star! (i give it no star)
reviews.title: Good location, reasonable price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this hotel online. We decided to visit Ankara during Ramadan. The hotel is located next to the shopping area, many restaurant are availeble. The rooms are clean and well furnished. The breakfast room is large and breakfast is served from the early morning hours. You can park the car just infornt of the hotel and leave the keys at the reception. We would recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: I recommend this hotel

reviews.text: i only stayed at this hotel for 5 hours and i had to leave the city..while i was checking out they charged me extra..the reason was because my friend came to vcarry my luggage for about hour and half and thats why i got charged extra because some one stayed with me..which i didnt even stay over night..only some one helped me to carry my bags and stayed with me for little while..i try to talk but i got nothing..it was redicilous.i wouldnt recommend to any body..they dont tell you ,but if you get charge for stupid reasons wouldnt be suprise..you might be stalking in this place be very careful..
reviews.title: Best Western Standard???

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel is fairly central in busy area.
reviews.title: best western very good
Very positive opinion
reviews.text: Room was clean, well appointed and comfortable. Large bath, good shower. No noise from street despite being located at front of hotel.
Staff very courteous, helpful and pleasant.
reviews.title: Cleaning Needed
